item.description:
( Note: This is NOT the Master Key System Study Group which "meet-up" on Mondays. )

"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone to share & support each other in
applying the Law of Attraction consistently in our lives everyday to deliberately
manifest our desires.


To join, please register by emailing ChewHoong at chk.misc@gmail.com.
You'll get an e-mail confirmation with call-in details.

our Intent for the Tele-Meetup:
The safe and supportive yet casual atmosphere of the call is designed as a way for us to continue to connect with like-hearted people in a very positive, high-vibrational way. Let's celebrate successes and manifestations and help each other with shared wisdom.


How do you know if you're ready to join this tele-meetup?

- You've heard about the Law of Attraction, you're interested, and want to know more.
- It seems like coincidences are happening in your life, but you don't know what it means or why they're happening.
- You are not experiencing the results you want (and deserve) to have.
- You want to understand why the same bad things keep happening to you over and over.
- You want to turn your dreams of living an ideal life into reality.
- You're willing to joyfully and generously share your knowledge and wisdom regarding the powerful Law of Attraction with others.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: LOA Masterminding
